item.name: Peanut Butter French Toast
item.description: French toast fried in olive oil, topped with house-made peanut butter and local honey, served with choice of whipped creme or jam

item.name: Balsamic Vinegar and Chicken Panini
item.description: Whole grain panini grilled in olive oil with fresh chicken thighs, spinach, balsamic vingarette dressing, red onions, and mustard

item.name: Orange Omelette
item.description: Free range eggs whisked with turmeric and cracked black pepper, served with kayle, mushrooms, red onions, peppers, and choice of salsa

item.name: Ginger Oats
item.description: Whole oats served with ginger, peanut butter, nuts and seeds, and blueberries, topped with local honey
